Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Gastrointestinal Diseases/Stomach Diseases/Gastritis/Gastritis, Hypertrophic
Record.Description: GASTRITIS with HYPERTROPHY of the GASTRIC MUCOSA. It is characterized by giant gastric folds, diminished acid secretion, excessive MUCUS secretion, and HYPOPROTEINEMIA. Symptoms include VOMITING; DIARRHEA; and WEIGHT LOSS.
